text:
Hello :slightly_smiling_face:

I am experiencing an issue with the conversations webhook subscription.

I have setup the required webhook to listen for new contacts created + reading of chat messages. I have also created a URL which listens for it. There is a test payload provided in HubSpot through which we can test our URL whether it is correct or not - I have validated this & from here it is *working fine*.

Now the issue is whenever we are creating a contact and conducting test chats, the webhook is not getting triggered...

Any suggestions or advice on how to troubleshoot this issue?
